Class MirrorOutputStream

java.lang.Object
  java.io.OutputStream
      MirrorOutputStream
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, Flushable
public class MirrorOutputStream
extends OutputStream

Takes a collection of OutputStreams and makes them look like one. All data is mirrored across the given OutputStreams.

Field Summary
private  ArrayList<OutputStream> _out
          The list of output streams.
 
Constructor Summary
MirrorOutputStream()
          Creates the output stream that writes to nowhere.
MirrorOutputStream(Collection<OutputStream> out)
          Creates the output stream that writes to several output streams.

          Creates the output stream that writes to several output streams.
MirrorOutputStream(OutputStream out)
          Creates the output stream that writes to another output stream.

main

public static void main(String... args)
Test. After 500 milliseconds of inactivity, it will finish up. Puts stdin in both stderr.txt (but not the 1st second of data) and stdout.txt.
